playerFlags.open: The faction doesn't require any invites
playerFlags.friendlyfire: The faction doesn't prevent the members from killing each other

adminFlags.nopowerloss: You don't lose power when you die in this zone
adminFlags.silent: The faction isn't mentioned when you cross its border
adminFlags.strongborders: The faction's land cannot be claimed
adminFlags.unlimitedland: The faction has no limit to the amount of land it can have
adminFlags.uncharted: The faction does not show up on a map
adminFlags.default: The faction is one of the default factions
adminFlags.nodamage: You cannot take damage on this faction's land
adminFlags.noexplode: Blocks in this land can't explode
adminFlags.nobuild: Players can't break of place blocks in this region
adminFlags.bonuspower: You lose/gain more power when you die/kill on this faction's land
